caseStudies.title: Case Studies
caseStudies.subtitle: See how communities and creators use Orderly One's no-code solution to build branded perp DEXs and turn trading fees into growth and utility.
caseStudies.aden.description: Aden, created by INBUM, the biggest Korean streamer with thousands of followers, saw a huge opportunity to keep his trading community’s activity within his own ecosystem. His community already generates over $50B in monthly trading volume on Gate and Bitget, so instead of directing that volume to third-party platforms, INBUM launched Aden, a fully branded perp DEX built with Orderly One’s no-code solution.
caseStudies.aden.treasury.title: How Aden Turns Trading into Community Value
caseStudies.aden.treasury.paragraph1: With Aden, INBUM set his own fees, branding, and user experience while eliminating the middleman. This move also gave his BGSC token new utility, as revenue from the DEX will be used for buybacks and burns, directly benefiting token holders.
caseStudies.aden.treasury.paragraph2: Through this DEX, Aden is building a self-sustaining ecosystem while giving his community a familiar trading environment they can trust, all under his own brand, Aden. Aden currently plays a key role within the Orderly ecosystem, responsible for the highest trading volume.
caseStudies.noot.description: NOOT, the first CTO memecoin on Abstract, quickly identified the need to bring real utility beyond just memes. They launched Nootrade.xyz, a custom perp DEX built using Orderly One's no-code solution, providing their community with a platform to trade perps within their own ecosystem.
Regularly repurchasing $NOOT tokens from the market and permanently removing them from circulation to create scarcity and strengthen long-term value.
caseStudies.noot.treasury.communityGrowt: Running targeted marketing campaigns and hosting engaging trading competitions to attract new users, boost participation, and increase brand visibility.
caseStudies.noot.treasury.cexListings.de: Allocating resources to secure listings on major centralized exchanges, expanding market access and improving token liquidity.
caseStudies.lol.description: LOL DEX was built to give tangible utility to the LOL token, a CTO meme on Solana. Using Orderly One’s no-code solution, the team spun up a branded perps DEX so their community can trade perps inside the LOL ecosystem while the project captures a share of fees for its own growth.
caseStudies.lol.treasury.tokenBuybacks.d: Regularly repurchasing $LOL tokens from the market and permanently removing them from circulation to create scarcity and strengthen long-term value.
caseStudies.lol.treasury.communityGrowth: Running targeted marketing campaigns and hosting engaging trading competitions to attract new users, boost participation, and increase brand visibility.
caseStudies.lol.treasury.cexListings.des: Allocating resources to secure listings on major centralized exchanges, expanding market access and improving token liquidity.
caseStudies.treasury.sectionHeading: Trading fees fund a self-sustaining treasury for:
caseStudies.note.firstTwoMonths: All figures are based on the first two months following the DEX's launch.
board.aboutFeesDescription: Total fees paid by users from trading (includes both DEX revenue and infrastructure fees)
board.aboutHowItWorksDescription: The board aggregates trading data from DEXs launched via Orderly One over the last 30 days.
board.aboutVolumeDescription: Sum of all perpetual trading volume
board.dexDetailNotFoundDescription: The requested DEX could not be found.
board.dexDetailPageDescription: View detailed statistics and performance metrics for {{brokerName}}, a DEX built on Orderly Network.
board.emptyDescription: The board will populate as DEXs generate trading activity.
board.subtitle: Discover the top performing DEXs on Orderly One
board.title: DEX Board
distributor.ambassadorDesc: Not a builder? No problem! You can register as an ambassador*.
distributor.ambassadorFooter: *After signing up as an ambassador, you cannot create your own DEX using the same address.
distributor.builderDesc: Builder with a strong network to help onboard projects to Orderly One. Orderly One's graduation rules apply to qualify.
distributor.connectWalletTitle: Connect your wallet to get started
distributor.connectWalletDesc: Authentication required. Please connect your wallet and login to create and manage your distributor profile
distributor.codeUpdateInvalidateNotice: Once updated, the original distributor code and URL will be invalidated.
distributor.createKeyHeader: Create key to manage your distributor profile
distributor.ctaParagraph: Orderly empowers anyone - builders, KOLs, and communities, to quickly launch a professional perpetual DEX and earn massive recurring revenue. Proven by real multi-million dollar exits. Stake $ORDER to unlock bigger rewards as volume grows.
distributor.dexCreationDesc: Create your own DEX as a builder. You will be directed to the configuration page to complete the setup.
distributor.dexGraduationDesc: Your distributor profile will be available after graduating your DEX. Graduate first to qualify automatically.
distributor.distributorNameHelp: Provide a name for your distributor profile. This name will be used in the HTML metadata, environment configuration, and other places throughout the Orderly One ecosystem.
distributor.distributorNameValidationHin: Alphanumeric characters, spaces, dots, hyphens, and underscores only. Other special characters are not permitted.
distributor.effectiveTierTooltip: Broker fee tier updates daily at {{time}}.
distributor.heroSubtitle: Refer builders to launch their perpetual DEX in ~10 minutes (no code required) and earn recurring revenue from trading fees.
distributor.historicalRevenueShareToolti: Your total revenue share to date from the Orderly Distributor Program.
distributor.inbumTitle: Inbum: Top Korean KOL's eight-figure acquisition
distributor.inviteeBrokerTierTooltip: The invitee's broker tier for the day. This serves as a reference, as certain tier updates may occur asynchronously under exceptional circumstances.
distributor.inviteeVolumeTooltip: Volume generated by the invitee for the day.
distributor.minTierEffectTime: Any changes to the minimum tier configuration will only take effect the next day at {{time}}.
distributor.minTierTooltip: Minimum tier guarantees your invitee the assigned tier or a higher one if they meet the requirements. Once you change the assigned tier, it will take effect at the next {{time}}.
distributor.myBrokerTierRefTooltip: Your latest broker tier for the day. This serves as a reference, as certain tier updates may occur asynchronously under exceptional circumstances.
distributor.myRevenueShareTooltip: Revenue share earned from the invitee for the day.
distributor.noInviteesYet: No invitees yet. Share your distributor code to start referring now!
distributor.orderlyKeyDescription: This key provides secure access to the Orderly Network API. It will be stored locally to manage your distributor profile. A wallet signature is required to create this key.
distributor.revenueTableFootnote1: Estimated monthly revenue; actual amount is dependent on referrals' tiers and their taker volume.
distributor.revenueTableFootnote2: Stake $ORDER tokens to unlock higher tiers immediately for higher earnings.
distributor.signUpThreeSteps: Sign up and start earning in 3 steps:
distributor.step1Desc: Create your distributor profile directly on Orderly One. Not a builder? No problem! You can register as an ambassador.
distributor.step2Desc: Share your distributor link or code with your network. Builders in your network can use it to setup their DEXes.
distributor.step3Desc: Immediately start earning revenue share once your invitees have successfully setup their DEXes and graduated.
distributor.totalInviteeVolumeTooltip: Total volume generated by your invitees for the day.
distributor.totalRevenueShareTooltip: Total revenue share earned from your invitees for the day.
home.hero.title: The First No-Code Perp DEX Launcher
home.hero.description: Launch a fully-featured Omnichain perpetuals exchange in minutes. Deep liquidity, 140+ assets, and support for 17+ major chains in minutes.
home.video.fallback: Your browser does not support the video tag.
home.ownExchange.title: Own the exchange
home.ownExchange.description: Welcome to Orderly One, your no-code AI builder to launch a perp DEX in minutes. 15+ chains, 110+ assets, up to 100x leverage. Your brand, your community, your DEX.
home.ownExchange.newRevenue.title: New Revenue Streams
home.ownExchange.newRevenue.description: Trading fees can be earned or shared with your community, instead of making the exchanges rich.
home.ownExchange.showcaseBrand.title: Showcase Your Brand
home.ownExchange.showcaseBrand.descripti: AI agents generate a custom theme for you, use your own logos, fonts, and colour scheme.
home.ownExchange.anyWallet.title: Any Wallet, Any Chain
home.ownExchange.anyWallet.description: An omnichain shared order book lets users access the way your community prefers.
home.infra.title: Built on Battle-Tested Infra
home.infra.description: Orderly’s SDK powers the DEXs deployed by WOO, Raydium, Quickswap, and other established DeFi powerhouses.
home.infra.bestLiquidity.title: Best-In-Class Liquidity
home.infra.bestLiquidity.description: Shared orderbooks are maintained by top institutional market makers, traders, and retail users all over the globe.
home.infra.security.title: Professional-Grade Security
home.infra.security.description: We work with renowned auditing and cybersecurity firms to protect smart contracts with 24/7 monitoring.
home.infra.cefiPerformance.title: CeFi-Grade Performance
home.infra.cefiPerformance.description: <200ms latency for high-frequency trading, with self-custody, onchain orders, full transparency, and all the other benefits of DeFi.
home.forSection.title: Orderly One is for...
home.forSection.tradingCommunities.title: Trading Communities
home.forSection.tradingCommunities.descr: Stop shilling ref-links: Launch your own DEX and capture 100% of your community's trading fees. Set your own fee structure—premium rates for profit or zero fees for loyalty.
home.forSection.memeProjects.title: Meme Projects
home.forSection.memeProjects.description: Give your meme token real utility. Launch a community perp dex, use trading fees for token buybacks, and reward your holders with better trading terms. Turn hype into revenue.
home.forSection.defiProtocols.title: DeFi Protocols
home.forSection.defiProtocols.descriptio: Add perpetuals to your protocol without months of development. White-label deployment in minutes—your brand, your fees, institutional-grade trading infrastructure.
home.forSection.everyone.title: Everyone
home.forSection.everyone.description: Why trade on someone else's exchange? Launch your own DEX in minutes. Set your fees, customize the experience, trade without limits. Your exchange, your rules.

points.form.validation.campaignTitle.max: Campaign title must be less than 40 characters
points.form.validation.description.max: Description must be less than 280 characters
points.form.validation.endDate.after: End date must be after start date
points.form.validation.volume.min: Trading volume cannot be less than 0
points.form.validation.l1.min: L1 referral rate cannot be less than 0
points.form.validation.l2.min: L2 referral rate cannot be less than 0
